subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The left-hander lowered his E.R.A. to an A.L.-leading 1.29 with eight solid innings and was backed by strong offensive efforts by Brett Gardner and Robinson Cano.
snippet: The left-hander lowered his E.R.A. to an A.L.-leading 1.29 with eight solid innings and was backed by strong offensive efforts by Brett Gardner and Robinson Cano.
